name: Forums Blue Theme
description: Just a simple blue theme for the Vortex forums.
additional_info:
If you want to change the blue to a different color, here are the hex codes I used:
#0f4e84 dark blue
#135894 blue 
#528fc4 light blue 

I wasn't able to change the jump to top of page button to blue, so feel free to do so if you want. Look for cloudflare-app[app-id="back-to-top-button"

I'm not taking requests. If you want something changed, do it yourself.
